subject: App crashing on login
body: Hi, whenever I try to login with my google account, the app crashes immediately. Please fix.

subject: Feature request: Dark mode
body: I love your app but my eyes hurt at night. Can you add a dark mode?

subject: Invoice for March
body: I haven't received the invoice for this month. Can you send it?

subject: Wrong size received
body: I ordered a size M but got an L. How can I exchange it?

subject: Return policy inquiry
body: What is your return policy for sale items?

subject: Where is my order?
body: It's been 2 weeks and I haven't received my package yet.
